code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Blog=()=>{const blogPosts=[{title:"Building a Portfolio with React",date:"2024-01-15",excerpt:"Learn how to create a modern portfolio website using React and modern web technologies.",readTime:"5 min read"},{title:"Data Visualization with D3.js",date:"2024-01-10",excerpt:"Exploring the power of D3.js for creating interactive data visualizations.",readTime:"8 min read"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{id:"blog",className:"blog",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Latest Blog Posts"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-grid",children:blogPosts.map((post,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("article",{className:"blog-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:post.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"blog-meta",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"date",children:post.date}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"read-time",children:post.readTime})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:post.excerpt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"#",className:"read-more",children:"Read More \u2192"})]},index))})]});};export default Blog;
